Column.name: TemplateName
Column.value: DDL Column Definition

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=" "%
$table = %ddlTableName% $enum = %LEFT($table, 4)% %if $enum == "ENUM"% $waarde=%ddlColumnName% $waarde=%LEFT($waarde, 256)% $omschrijving=%ddlColumnComment% $omschrijving=%LEFT($omschrijving, 512)% INSERT INTO %ddlTableName% (waarde, omschrijving) VALUES ('$waarde','$omschrijving'); %else%
%DDLName("EA", "COLUMN", "", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")%
$remark = "----------------- Datatype -------------------" %DDLDataType%
$remark = "----------------- Setup Properties -------------------" $Type = %columnProperty:"TYPE"% $Default = %columnProperty:"DEFAULT"%
$Find = "" %if $Type != "ENUM" and $Type != "SET"% %if $Default != ""% $Find = %FIND($Default, "DEFAULT")% %if $Find == "-1"% $Default = "DEFAULT " + $Default %endIf% %endIf% %endIf%
$Zerofill = "" $Unsigned = "" %if columnBoolProperty:"ZEROFILL" == "T"% $Zerofill = "ZEROFILL" %endIf% %if columnBoolProperty:"UNSIGNED" == "T"% $Unsigned = "UNSIGNED" %endIf%
$remark = "----------------- Is NULL -------------------" $Nullable = "" %if columnBoolProperty:"NULLABLE" != "T"% $Nullable = "NOT NULL" %else% %if ddlOptionGenerateNullable == "T"% $Nullable = "NULL" %endIf% %endIf%
$remark = "----------------- Autonum -------------------" $AutoNum = "" %if columnBoolProperty:"AutoNum" == "T"% $AutoNum = "AUTO_INCREMENT" %endIf%
$remark = "----------------- Add keywords in correct positions -------------------" %if $Type == "ENUM" or $Type == "SET"% %if $Default != ""% $Default %endIf% %if $Nullable != ""% $Nullable %endIf% %else% %if $Zerofill != ""% $Zerofill %endIf% %if $Unsigned != ""% $Unsigned %endIf% %if $Nullable != ""% $Nullable %endIf% %if $AutoNum != ""% $AutoNum %endIf% %if $Default != ""% $Default %endIf% %endIf%
$remark = "----------------- Comments -------------------" %DDLColumnComment%
%PI("I", "")% , %endIf%

Column.name: TemplateName
Column.value: DDL Create Table

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if ddlOptionGenerateTable != "T"% %endTemplate%
%PI="
"%
$SnapShotName = %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER")% %EXECUTE_CURRENT($SnapShotName, "Create Table", 590)%
$enum=%LEFT($SnapShotName, 4)% %if $enum == "ENUM"% $id=$SnapShotName + "ID" CREATE TABLE %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")% ( $id int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, waarde VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, omschrijving VARCHAR(512) NULL, PRIMARY KEY ($id) ) %else% CREATE TABLE %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")%
$remark = "----------------- Build definition of columns -------------------" $tableContent = %list="DDLColumnDefinition" @separator="
" @indent="	"% $tableContent += "
"
$remark = "----------------- PK constraints need to be created inline with the table all the time -------------------" $constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="
" @indent="	" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "PK"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "
" %endIf%
%if ddlOptionGenerateSeparateConstraint != "T"% $remark = "----------------- When FK, uniques, checks are create inline with table -------------------"
$constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="
" @indent="	" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "unique"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "
" %endIf% $constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="
" @indent="	" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "check"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "
" %endIf% $constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="
" @indent="	" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "FK"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "
" %endIf%
%endIf%
$tableContent = %REMOVE_LAST_SEPARATOR($tableContent, ",")% $tableContent = %TRIM($tableContent, "
")% ( $tableContent ) %endIf%
%if ddlOptionGenerateTableProperty == "T"% $remark = "----------------- Table Properties -------------------" %if tableProperty:"Engine" != ""% ENGINE=%tableProperty:"Engine"% %endIf% $charset1 = %tableProperty:"CHARSET"% $charset2 = %tableProperty:"CHARACTER SET"% %if $charset1 != ""% DEFAULT CHARSET $charset1 %endIf% %if $charset2 != ""% DEFAULT CHARACTER SET $charset2 %endIf% %if tableProperty:"COLLATE" != ""% COLLATE %tableProperty:"COLLATE"% %endIf% %endIf%
$tableComment = %DDLTableLevelComment% %if $tableComment != ""% $tableComment %endIf%
%DDLScriptSeparator%
%PI="
"% %if ddlOptionGenerateSeparateConstraint != "T"% $remark = "----------------- When Indexes and triggers are to be created with the table -------------------" %if ddlGenerateToExecuteEngine != "T"% $indexDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="
" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "index"% %if $indexDDL != ""% $indexDDL = "
" + $indexDDL + "
" $indexDDL %endIf%
$triggerDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="

" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "trigger"% %if $triggerDDL != ""% $triggerDDL += "
" $triggerDDL %endIf% %endIf%
%endIf%
%if $enum == "ENUM"% $columnInserts = %list="DDLColumnDefinition" @separator="
" @indent="	"% $columnInserts %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value: INSERT INTO tavel (waarde) VALUES ('jkjkj') ;

Column.name: Template
Column.value: INSERT INTO %ddlTableName% (waarde) VALUES (%ddlColumnName%) ;

Column.name: TemplateName
Column.value: DDL Create Table

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if ddlOptionGenerateTable != "T"% %endTemplate%
%PI="\n"%
$SnapShotName = %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER")% %EXECUTE_CURRENT($SnapShotName, "Create Table", 590)%
$tableName = %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")% $TEMPORARY = %tableProperty:"TEMPORARY"%
$enum=%LEFT($tableName, 6)% $enum=%RIGHT($enum, 4)% %if $enum == "ENUM"% CREATE TABLE %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")% ( ID int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, waarde VARCHAR2(256) NOT NULL, omschrijving VARCHAR2(512) NULL, ) %else%
%if $TEMPORARY=="YES"% CREATE GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE $tableName %else% CREATE TABLE $tableName %endIf%
$remark = "----------------- Build definition of columns -------------------" $tableContent = %list="DDLColumnDefinition" @separator="\n" @indent="\t"% $tableContent += "\n"
%if ddlOptionGenerateSeparateConstraint != "T"% $remark = "----------------- When PK, FK, uniques, checks are create inline with table -------------------"
$constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="\n" @indent="\t" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "PK"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "\n" %endIf% $constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="\n" @indent="\t" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "unique"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "\n" %endIf% $constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="\n" @indent="\t" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "check"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "\n" %endIf% $constraintDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="\n" @indent="\t" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "FK"% %if $constraintDDL != ""% $tableContent += $constraintDDL $tableContent += "\n" %endIf%
%endIf%
$tableContent = %REMOVE_LAST_SEPARATOR($tableContent, ",")% $tableContent = %TRIM($tableContent, "\n")% ( $tableContent ) %endIf%
%if ddlOptionGenerateTableProperty == "T"% $remark = "-- Start of Table Properties -- "
%if $TEMPORARY=="YES"%
$ONCOMMIT = %tableProperty:"ON COMMIT"% %if $ONCOMMIT != ""% ON COMMIT $ONCOMMIT %endIf%
%else%
$ORGANIZATION = %tableProperty:"ORGANIZATION"% %if $ORGANIZATION == "IOT"% ORGANIZATION INDEX %endIf%
$TABLESPACE = %tableProperty:"TABLESPACE"% %if $TABLESPACE != "" and $TABLESPACE != "0"% TABLESPACE $TABLESPACE %endIf%
$PCTUSED = %tableProperty:"PCTUSED"% %if $PCTUSED != "" and $PCTUSED != "0"% PCTUSED $PCTUSED %endIf%
$PCTFREE = %tableProperty:"PCTFREE"% %if $PCTFREE != "" and $PCTFREE != "0"% PCTFREE $PCTFREE %endIf%
$INITRANS = %tableProperty:"INITRANS"% %if $INITRANS != "" and $INITRANS != "0"% INITRANS $INITRANS %endIf%
$MAXTRANS = %tableProperty:"MAXTRANS"% %if $MAXTRANS != "" and $MAXTRANS != "0"% MAXTRANS $MAXTRANS %endIf%
$storageProps = ""
$INITIAL = %tableProperty:"INITIAL"% %if $INITIAL != "" and $INITIAL != "0"% $storageProps += "\n INITIAL " + $INITIAL %endIf%
$MINEXTENTS = %tableProperty:"MINEXTENTS"% %if $MINEXTENTS != "" and $MINEXTENTS != "0"% $storageProps += "\n MINEXTENTS " + $MINEXTENTS %endIf%
$MAXEXTENTS = %tableProperty:"MAXEXTENTS"% %if $MAXEXTENTS != "" and $MAXEXTENTS != "0"% $storageProps += "\n MAXEXTENTS " + $MAXEXTENTS %endIf%
$PCTINCREASE = %tableProperty:"PCTINCREASE"% %if $PCTINCREASE != "" and $PCTINCREASE != "0"% $storageProps += "\n PCTINCREASE " + $PCTINCREASE %endIf%
$DBVERSION = %tableProperty:"DBVERSION"% $find = %FIND($DBVERSION, ".")% $ver = %LEFT($DBVERSION, $find)% %if $ver == "9"% $FREELISTS = %tableProperty:"FREELISTS"% %if $FREELISTS != "" and $FREELISTS != "0"% $storageProps += "\n FREELISTS " + $FREELISTS %endIf% %endIf%
$BUFFER_POOL = %tableProperty:"BUFFER_POOL"% %if $BUFFER_POOL != ""% $storageProps += "\n BUFFER_POOL " + $BUFFER_POOL %endIf%
$storageProps = %TRIM($storageProps, "\n")% %if $storageProps != ""% STORAGE ( $storageProps ) %endIf%
$LOGGING = %tableProperty:"LOGGING"% %if $LOGGING == "YES"% $LOGGING = "LOGGING" %endIf% %if $LOGGING != ""% $LOGGING %endIf%
$COMPRESSION= %tableProperty:"COMPRESSION"% %if $COMPRESSION == "DISABLED"% NOCOMPRESS %elseIf $COMPRESSION == "ENABLED"% COMPRESS %elseIf $COMPRESSION != ""% $COMPRESSION %endIf%
%if $ORGANIZATION != "IOT"% $CACHE= %tableProperty:"CACHE"% %if $CACHE == "N"% $CACHE = "NOCACHE" %endIf% %if $CACHE != ""% $CACHE %endIf% %endIf%
$PARALLEL= %tableProperty:"PARALLEL"% %if $PARALLEL == "NOPARALLEL"% $PARALLEL = "NOPARALLEL" %elseIf $PARALLEL != ""% $PARALLEL = "PARALLEL" %endIf% %if $PARALLEL != ""% $PARALLEL %endIf%
$MONITORING= %tableProperty:"MONITORING"% %if $MONITORING == "YES"% $MONITORING = "MONITORING" %endIf% %if $MONITORING != ""% $MONITORING %endIf%
%endIf%
$remark = "-- End of Table Properties -- " %endIf%
%DDLStatementTerm%
%if ddlOptionGenerateSeparateConstraint != "T"% $remark = "----------------- When Indexes and triggers are to be created with the table -------------------" %if ddlGenerateToExecuteEngine != "T"% $indexDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="\n" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "index"% %if $indexDDL != ""% $indexDDL %endIf%
$triggerDDL = %list="DDLTableConstraint" @separator="\n\n" constraintProperty:"TYPE" == "trigger"% %if $triggerDDL != ""% $triggerDDL %endIf% %endIf%
%endIf%
%if $enum == "ENUM"% $tablename = %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")% $tablename = %TRIM($tablename)% $tablename_mid = %MID($tablename, 1)% $pk_name = %qt% $pk_name += "PK_" $pk_name += $tablename_mid ALTER TABLE $tablename ADD CONSTRAINT $pk_name PRIMARY KEY ("ID") USING INDEX;
$columnInserts = %list="DDLColumnDefinition" @separator="\n" @indent="\t"% $columnInserts %endIf%

Column.name: TemplateName
Column.value: DDL Column Definition

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=" "%
$table = %ddlTableName% $enum = %LEFT($table, 4)% %if $enum == "ENUM"% $sleutel=%ddlColumnAlias% $waarde=%ddlColumnName% $waarde=%LEFT($waarde, 256)% $omschrijving=%ddlColumnComment% $omschrijving=%LEFT($omschrijving, 512)% INSERT INTO %ddlTableName% (ID, waarde, omschrijving) VALUES ($sleutel,'$waarde','$omschrijving'); %else%
%DDLName("EA", "COLUMN", "", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")%
$remark = "----------------- Datatype -------------------" $datatype = %DDLDataType% %if $datatype == "datetime"% $datatype = "DATE" %endIf% $tmpdatatype = %LEFT($datatype, 8)% %if $tmpdatatype == "varchar("% $tmpdatatype = "VARCHAR2(" $tmpdatatype += %MID($datatype, 8)% $datatype = $tmpdatatype %endIf% $datatype
$remark = "----------------- Default -------------------" %if columnProperty:"DEFAULT" != ""% DEFAULT %columnProperty:"DEFAULT"% %endIf%
$remark = "----------------- Is NULL -------------------" %if columnBoolProperty:"NULLABLE" != "T"% NOT NULL %elseIf ddlOptionGenerateNullable == "T"% NULL %endIf%
%PI("I", "")% ,
$remark = "----------------- Inline Comment -------------------" %if ddlOptionColumnComments == "T"% $sComment = %ddlColumnComment% %if $sComment != ""% $sComment = %REPLACE($sComment, "\n", " ")% -- $sComment %endIf% %endIf% %endIf%

Column.name: TemplateName
Column.value: DDL Foreign Constraint

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=" "%
%if ddlOptionGenerateSeparateConstraint == "T"% $SnapShotName = %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER")% + "." + %DDLName("EA", "CONSTRAINT")% %EXECUTE_CURRENT($SnapShotName, "Add Foreign Key", 440)% ALTER TABLE %DDLName("EA", "TABLE", "INCLUDE_OWNER", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")% \n ADD %endIf%
$constraintName = %DDLName("EA", "CONSTRAINT", "", "INCLUDE_SURROUND")% %if $constraintName != ""% CONSTRAINT $constraintName %endIf%
%if ddlOptionGenerateSeparateConstraint == "T"% %PI("I", "\n\t")% %endIf%
%PI=" "% FOREIGN KEY (%list="DDLConstraintColumnName" @separator=","%)
%DDLReferenceDefinition%
%PI("I", "")% %if ddlOptionGenerateSeparateConstraint == "T"% \n%DDLStatementTerm% %else% , %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value: Column{ notes="Naam van de gemeente." scope="Public" container="" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="gemeentenaam" type="VARCHAR" length="80" } Column{ notes="Straatnaam." scope="Public" container="" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="straatnaam" type="VARCHAR" length="200" } Column{ notes="Huisnummer" scope="Public" container="" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="huisnummer" type="INTEGER" length="5" } Column{ notes="Huisletter" scope="Public" container="" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="huisletter" type="VARCHAR" length="1" } Column{ notes="Huisnummertoevoeging" scope="Public" container="" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="huisnummertoevoeging" type="VARCHAR" length="4" } Column{ notes="Postcode" scope="Public" container="" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="postcode" type="VARCHAR" length="6" } Column{ notes="BAGID" scope="Public" container="" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="BAGID" type="VARCHAR" length="80" }

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if classStereotype=="Verwijzing"% %endTemplate% %if classStereotype=="Metagegevens"% %endTemplate%
$naam=%className% $classnaam=$naam
%if packageAlias !=""% $naam=%packageAlias% + "_" + $naam %endIf% $naam=%LEFT($naam, 30)% $naam=%REPLACE($naam, "-", "_")% $naam=%REPLACE($naam, "/", "_")%
$notes=%classNotes% %if $notes !=""% $notes+=" " %endIf% $notes+="Naam alias (gebruikt bij koppeltabellen en foreignkeys): " $notes+=%classAlias%
Table { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table")% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("language", "stereotype", "name")% %TRANSFORM_TAGS("beschikbaarheid", "betrouwbaarheid en kwaliteit", "integriteit", "vertrouwelijkheid")% $naam=%CONVERT_NAME($naam, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")% name=%qt%$naam%qt% notes=%qt%$notes%qt% language=%qt%%genOptDefaultDatabase%%qt% %list="Attribute__RSGB" @separator="\n" @indent=" "% Column { notes="Het systeem waarvandaan de data is geladen." scope="Public" container="" alias="Bron" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="M_Bronsysteem" type="VARCHAR" length="200" Tag { name = "Bron" value = ""} } Column { notes="Datum en tijd waarop data is geladen." scope="Public" container="" alias="M_DatumTijdGeladen" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="M_DatumTijdGeladen" type="DATETIME" Tag { name = "Bron" value = "Systeemtijd"} } %if elemType != "Association"% PrimaryKey { Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($classnaam, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase, "Integer")%%qt% } } %endIf% } %list="Connector" @separator="\n"%

Column.name: Template
Column.value: Column { %if attAlias!=""% $naam=%TRIM(attAlias)% %else% $naam=%TRIM(attName)% %endIf% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("type", "stereotype", "collection", "constant", "containment", "ordered", "static", "volatile", "derived")% name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naam, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase, attType)%%qt% }

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%if connectorSourceAlias !=""% $naamsource=%TRIM(connectorSourceElemAlias)% %else% $naamsource=%TRIM(connectorSourceElemName)% %endIf% $naamsource=%LEFT($naamsource, 28)% $naamsource=%REPLACE($naamsource, "-", "_")% $naamsource=%REPLACE($naamsource, "/", "_")% %if connectorDestAlias !=""% $naamdest=%TRIM(connectorDestElemAlias)% %else% $naamdest=%TRIM(connectorDestElemName)% %endIf% $naamdest=%LEFT($naamdest, 28)% $naamdest=%REPLACE($naamdest, "-", "_")% $naamdest=%REPLACE($naamdest, "/", "_")% %if connectorType == "Generalization"%
ForeignKey { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("General",connectorGUID)% Source { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorSourceElemGUID)% name=%qt%%DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamsource, $naamdest)%%qt% multiplicity="0..1" Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamsource, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } Target { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorDestElemGUID)% multiplicity="1" Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamdest, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } } %endTemplate%
%if connectorType != "Association" and connectorType!="Aggregation"% %endTemplate% %if connectorAssociationClassElemAlias !=""% $naamassoc=%TRIM(connectorAssociationClassElemAlias)% %else% $naamassoc=%TRIM(connectorAssociationClassElemName)% %endIf% $naamassoc=%CONVERT_NAME($naamassoc, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")% $naamassoc=%LEFT($naamassoc, 30)% $naamassoc=%REPLACE($naamassoc, "-", "_")% $naamassoc=%REPLACE($naamassoc, "/", "_")%
%if connectorIsAssociationClass == "T"% ForeignKey { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("FK1",connectorGUID)% Source { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorAssociationClassElemGUID)% name=%qt%%DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamassoc, $naamsource)%%qt% multiplicity="0..1" Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamsource, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } Target { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorSourceElemGUID)% multiplicity="1" Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamsource, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } } ForeignKey { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("FK2",connectorGUID)% Source { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorAssociationClassElemGUID)% $fkname=%DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamassoc, $naamdest)% name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($fkname, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%%qt% multiplicity="0..1" Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamdest, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } Target { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorDestElemGUID)% multiplicity="1" Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamdest, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } } %endTemplate%
%if connectorDestElemType=="Association"% $destMultiple = "T" $srcMult = %connectorSourceMultiplicity% %elseIf connectorSourceElemType=="Association"% $sourceMultiple = "T" $dstMult = %connectorDestMultiplicity% %else% $srcMult = %connectorSourceMultiplicity% $dstMult = %connectorDestMultiplicity% %if $srcMult != "" and $srcMult != "0" and $srcMult != "0..1" and $srcMult != "1"% $sourceMultiple = "T" %endIf% %if $dstMult != "" and $dstMult != "0" and $dstMult != "0..1" and $dstMult != "1"% $destMultiple = "T" %endIf% %endIf%
$comment = "When both source and destination multiplicities are T" %if $sourceMultiple == "T" and $destMultiple == "T"%
$kp="KP_" $tableName="" %if connectorName != ""% $tableName=%TRIM(connectorName)% $tableName=$kp + $naamsource + "_" + $naamdest %else% $tableName=$kp + $naamsource + "_" + $naamdest %endIf% $tableName=%TRIM($tableName)%
%if packageAlias !=""% $tableName=%packageAlias% + "_" + $tableName %endIf% $tableName=%LEFT($tableName, 30)% $tableName=%CONVERT_NAME($tableName, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%
Table { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("LinkTable", connectorGUID)% name=%qt%$tableName%qt% language=%qt%%genOptDefaultDatabase%%qt% Column { notes="Het systeem waarvandaan de data is geladen." scope="Public" container="" alias="Bron" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="M_Bronsysteem" type="VARCHAR" length="200" Tag { name = "Bron" value = ""} } Column { notes="Datum en tijd waarop data is geladen." scope="Public" container="" alias="M_DatumTijdGeladen" lowerbound="1" default="" upperbound="1" name="M_DatumTijdGeladen" type="DATETIME" Tag { name = "Bron" value = "Systeemtijd"} } } ForeignKey { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("FK1",connectorGUID)% Source { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("LinkTable",connectorGUID)% %if connectorDestRole != ""% name=%qt%%DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $tableName, connectorDestRole)%%qt% %else% name=%qt%%DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $tableName, $naamdest)%%qt% %endIf% %if $srcMult != ""% multiplicity=%qt%$srcMult%qt% %endIf% Column { %if connectorDestRole != ""% name=%qt%%connectorDestRole%%qt% %else% name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamdest, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% %endIf% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } Target { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorDestElemGUID)% Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamdest, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } } ForeignKey { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("FK2",connectorGUID)% Source { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("LinkTable",connectorGUID)% %if connectorSourceRole != ""% name=%qt%%DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $tableName, connectorSourceRole)%%qt% %else% name=%qt%%DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $tableName, $naamsource)%%qt% %endIf% %if $dstMult != ""% multiplicity=%qt%$dstMult%qt% %endIf% Column { %if connectorSourceRole != ""% name=%qt%%connectorSourceRole%%qt% %else% name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamsource, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% %endIf% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } Target { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorSourceElemGUID)% Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamsource, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } } $comment = "When source multiplicity is T" %elseIf $sourceMultiple == "T"%
%if connectorSourceElemType=="Association"% $fkName = %DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamsource, $naamdest)% %elseIf connectorName != ""% $fkName = %DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamsource, connectorName)% %elseIf connectorDestRole != ""% $fkName = %DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamsource, connectorDestRole)% %endIf% $fkname=%CONVERT_NAME($fkname, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")% $fkName=%LEFT($fkname, 30)%
ForeignKey { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("FK1",connectorGUID)% Source { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorSourceElemGUID)% name=%qt%$fkName%qt% %if $srcMult != ""% multiplicity=%qt%$srcMult%qt% %endIf% Column { %if connectorDestRole != ""% name=%qt%%connectorDestRole%%qt% %else% name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamdest, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% %endIf% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } Target { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorDestElemGUID)% %if $dstMult != ""% multiplicity=%qt%$dstMult%qt% %endIf% Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamdest, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } } $comment = "When destination multiplicity is T or both source & destination multiplicities are F" %else%
%if connectorSourceElemType=="Association"% $fkName = %DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamdest, $naamsource)% %elseIf connectorName != ""% $fkName = %DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamdest, connectorName)% %elseIf connectorDestRole != ""% $fkName = %DB_CONSTRAINT_NAME("FK", $naamdest, connectorDestRole)% %endIf% $fkName=%CONVERT_NAME($fkName, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")% $fkName=%LEFT($fkname, 30)%
ForeignKey { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("FK1",connectorGUID)% Source { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorDestElemGUID)% name=%qt%$fkName%qt% %if $dstMult != ""% multiplicity=%qt%$dstMult%qt% %endIf% Column { %if connectorSourceRole != ""% name=%qt%%connectorSourceRole%%qt% %else% name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamsource, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% %endIf% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } Target { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table",connectorSourceElemGUID)% %if $srcMult != ""% multiplicity=%qt%$srcMult%qt% %endIf% Column { name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naamsource, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%ID%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase,"Integer")%%qt% } } } %endIf%

Column.name: TemplateName
Column.value: Linked Attribute

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if classAlias!=""% $naam=%classAlias% %else% $naam=%className% %endIf%
$startsenum=%FIND($naam, "enum_")% %if $startsenum == "-1"% $naam="enum_" + $naam %endIf%
%if packageAlias !=""% $naam=%packageAlias% + "." + $naam %endIf% $naam=%LEFT($naam, 30)% $naam=%REPLACE($naam, "-", "_")% $naam=%REPLACE($naam, "/", "_")%
Table { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("Table")% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("language", "stereotype", "name")% %TRANSFORM_TAGS("beschikbaarheid", "betrouwbaarheid en kwaliteit", "integriteit", "vertrouwelijkheid")% name=%qt%%CONVERT_NAME($naam, "Spaced", "Pascal Case")%%qt% language=%qt%%genOptDefaultDatabase%%qt% %list="Attribute__ENUM" @separator="\n" @indent=" "% }

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value: $name=%attName% $name=%REPLACE($name,"'","")% Column { %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("name", "type", "stereotype", "collection", "constant", "containment", "ordered", "static", "volatile", "derived")% name=%qt%$name%qt% type=%qt%%CONVERT_DB_TYPE(genOptDefaultDatabase, attType)%%qt% }
